website_summaries.verdict: You might feel like a Wolverine Superhero using these claws, which are made of stainless steel and better than plastic or nylon claws, which could melt or bend and create food safety issues.
pros: These claws are durable and made of solid stainless steel
A good fit for smaller hands
Very handy for lifting large cuts of meat from any surface
Make it easy to shred chicken, pork, and beef
cons: For those with  larger hands/fingers, touching the metal could cause rubbing,  resulting in possible blisters

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, easy to hold, a must for pulled pork bbq!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for pulling pork, or if you find yourself in a wolverine fight. These things are sharp! Very well-made, heavy and the perfect tool for a big barbecue. What normally takes 7-10 minutes with forks, took less than 2 with these! After washing with soup I used the oil I used for my cutting board to make sure they don’t split. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ems

customer_reviews.title: Oh ... yeah. Claws.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best way to hold a turkey or roast while slicing it. Nothing compares. There are plastic ones out there that probably do as well... for a while. For about the same price, you gotta have metal claws with wood handles. Aaarrrh rouugghh rouugghh rouugghh!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Bears have it right - modern claws for humans!
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of these, and recently purchased one for a friend. They are AMAZING! If you've ever tried to shred chicken or beef with forks, you need to try these. You will wonder how you EVER did it with those primitive tools before!
customer_reviews.author: bringbackmsmoney

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need for shredded meats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these specifically for pulled pork. They work like a champ! Was exactly what I was looking for. Very sturdy build quality and the little knives on the end are just sharp enough to tear through the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Wolverine Action
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. Solid steel and easy to use and clean. I bought these for my husband for Christmas for his Egg when he smokes meat. So durable and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Herrera

customer_reviews.title: I also felt the claws were better spaced than some of the other ones I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift so I didn't use them but they looked and felt substantial as opposed to others that are light and plastic. It was a highly appreciated gift for a person who is fussy about barbecue tools. I also felt the claws were better spaced than some of the other ones I have seen. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Piper

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job for shredding
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job for shredding, also lifting a hot brisket, ribs, etc. to platter. Heavy duty, I clean these by hand because of the wood handle, they have stayed very nice, and clean easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Warning be careful with this product
customer_reviews.text: First impressions was it seemed like a useful addition to my cookware but dishonesty is not a good way to get customer reliability these are not stainless steel nor should these be used to prepare or cut food the fact that they are advertised as such and no one else called this company out on it is shameful please do your homework before buying these you dont want to risk your families health on this if you dont believe me order them and put them in water for ten minutes then let them air dry overnight or so and you will see someone is not telling us what these really are made of its certainly not stainless steel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Become Wolverine
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son in law for Christmas. He is an avid barbecue/smoker. He is thrilled with this product. Makes him feel like Wolverine. Each claw is a knife. Super handy for pulling pork and lifting large cuts of meat from any surface. Fits even large hands. A must have for everyone who likes to grill or smoke.
customer_reviews.author: teresa brodie

customer_reviews.title: Inferior Quality
customer_reviews.text: This review is for 1Easylife 18/8 Stainless Steel Meat Forks with Wooden Handle. They are certainly not as pictured! Wood handles are not stained or finished, made with inferior wood that feels splintery. Stainless steel claws are nicely finished on the top but the bottoms are questionable and I would not use on my food. Very disappointed and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: singingeagleusa

customer_reviews.title: High quality & Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: These claws seem to be made with very high quality materials and feel great in your hand. Its also important to note that these are very sharp so don't leave them around with kids! The first set i ordered the one of the handles was a bit wobbly, so i contacted the seller about this. They were super helpful and shipped me a new set free of charge. Great customer service, but they're located in China, so communication is a bit delayed. Would absolutely recommend this product to anyone based off the high quality material and great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin S.

customer_reviews.title: Superb design but deeply flawed execution
customer_reviews.text: Someone said to me once years ago the difference between carpentry and Cabinet making is a question of how many hundred dollar note so you can fit in the gaps. These implements are clearly from the Carpenter and not the cabinet maker. The design is lovely but the execution is really lacking. The gap also creates numerous health issues as bacteria and food can get trapped in there and will come out and anything you repair subsequently. Give these guys a miss
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son who has, now, used them and they are the best "claws" available. They are heavy metal with comfortable/substantial wood handles. Word of caution: the metal claws are VERY SHARP!! I would highly recommend these for anyone wanting to easily shred any type of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Worked Well!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these meat claws to use when preparing pulled pork and other meats that needed shredding and was very happy with the performance. The claws were really sharp so I would use caution around children and when washing after shredding any meats. I like the wooden handles and would someday find a set with silicone or plastic handles. Overall, I was happy with these meat claws and would order again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: GAShopr65

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Tool - or Weapon
customer_reviews.text: Even though it looks like a medieval torture device, it really does a great job lifting large roasts from the crock pot and shredding meats. Used this to shred chicken breast for some buffalo dip. Worked great. If you like to smoke pork, you'll like this little gadget. Makes pulling the pork much easier. Overall it's good quality casting/forging with solid wood handles. Pretty solid construction and doesn't look cheap and isn't flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic job, even on huge cuts of meat
customer_reviews.text: I work in a busy kitchen and my boss had these to shred the huge pot roasts for the restaurant. Until I saw these, I had been using forks at home...dummy...lol. They are very well-constructed, sturdy and do an amazing job even on big cuts of meat. I wouldn't put them through the dishwasher with the wooden handles, but they wash up nicely by hand washing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChattyCat

customer_reviews.title: Very functional product, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The claws make short work of shredding a pork butt, are convenient for handling hot meat, and clean up is quick and simpleThe first set I had come with a chip/crack on one claw. The day after I emailed the seller, they replied back that they were sending me a new full set, which arrived within a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bear claws after I got an instapot. I love them! It is so simple to shred meat. I had 3 pounds of chicken thighs and shredded the meat after cooked in less than 2 minutes. These babies are sturdy. There were others that were cheaper but these wont fail me and I cook a lot. They are beautiful and easy to clean and the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: cobrajet427

customer_reviews.title: These Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I should mention that I don't have anything to compare them to since they're my first set that I've owned. They are really sturdy and seem like they'll last forever if taken care of. They shredded pork with ease and also worked well to lift a heavy ham out of the roaster. When using them on New Year's, I think I made my parents and inlaws want a set.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: He hasn't been able to use them YET but upon delivery - I noticed the product came in a very nice "gift box"
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a BBQ fanatic friend. He hasn't been able to use them YET but upon delivery - I noticed the product came in a very nice "gift box". I snuck a peek and the item was very well made. I know I'd be happy to receive. Will hopefully update review after our friend uses it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: Are a very useful tool due to its solid construction and the material of which it is made. I used them to move a 25-pound shank and at no time did I feel that they were getting out of my hands or being folded. Instead I felt very safe when using them.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J. Montanez Colon

customer_reviews.title: Dad loved these!!
customer_reviews.text: My Dad was very surprised when he got these. They're a fierce kitchen gadget. My Dad is always roasting, smoking, grilling. They're very well made, easy to grip and offers a more balance grip removing meats from their cooking station
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Impulse purchase. While they arrived quickly and are well made, I’m not sure that I actually needed them. If you do a lot of roasts to shredded meals, these claws are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to shred meat from the slow cooker to make pulled pork and shredded beef. They are slightly easier than using two forks. They are really well made. I don't know what the negative reviewers who have criticized the construction were expecting. They seem sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Like shark teeth
customer_reviews.text: I like these metal claws better than the plastic ones. Shredding meat is really easy. The wooden handles are comfortable and very sturdy. They are easy to clean and can be conveniently stored. They work with all types of meat.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: After opening and handling them , they seem fit for purpose. However; they are not LARGE. I'm 6' 3" and these claws "just" fit my hands. Makes me wonder if these glowing reviews are authentic or merely a means by the seller to generate sales. Regardless, they seem up to the task they're designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Cone

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pulled Pork
customer_reviews.text: These are great. He uses them to lift meat in and out of the smoker and then uses the claws to prepare pulled pork. Very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen A.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my father in law. He was excited for the gift. Not sure if he has used it yet though. Seemed likes better quality than the plastic ones on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, does the job
customer_reviews.text: The meat claws shipped out and arrived on time. They seem heavy and okay quality but don't have that great of a finish to them. They could be a little bigger, they are fine for my wife but barely fit my hands. Seem to do what they are made for.
customer_reviews.author: LLP

customer_reviews.title: made well and really useful
customer_reviews.text: designed for what what they're supposed to . b-b-q and smoking are more stone-age than space age so chill out and enjoy the ride !!!
customer_reviews.author: 4 of 4

customer_reviews.title: No problem on second set ordered
customer_reviews.text: In first pair I purchased one of the wooden handles was scratched and was loose. I returned that set to Amazon and ordered a new set. Upon recieving the new set they were okay no loose, scratched handles and and handles were securely fastened. Can't wait to use these this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: gbd

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Handles are starting to fade and become rough from the hand washing.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie

customer_reviews.title: Shreds quickly and efficiently!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these! Great way to easily pull pork or beef! Easily stored in their box! Nothing not to like!
customer_reviews.author: Betty H Blakley

customer_reviews.title: Not Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Its not sharp as knife but need to dig the meat to get the shredded meat.Not Useful at all. Better work can be done with a help of a fork.
customer_reviews.author: Ameen K.

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: The wood handles are not sealed They will not last through many washings:(.
customer_reviews.author: dave t.

customer_reviews.title: Bad on hands but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Solid and strong. Bad ergonomics and will make your hands hurts and even blister ya when doing a large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, strong.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great, solid, strong, good grips, made pulled pork and pulled turkey.
customer_reviews.author: off grid

customer_reviews.title: Great for shredding meat
customer_reviews.text: Strong metal tines, fairly sharp. I took a burnishing rod to the "Blades" to knock down the edge burrs from machining. Does an awesome job of shredding. Better than the plastic ones I had before, they always would flex when shredding meat
customer_reviews.author: Jamawama

customer_reviews.title: A chef must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband who is a chef. He loves them. Will definitely get a lot of use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Lewis

customer_reviews.title: It says dishwasher safe.  That means the blade part NOT the wood!!
customer_reviews.text: That means the blade part NOT the wood!! Put in dishwasher and the stain/color washed right out revealing bland and rough handles. Dang! I wish this had been clarified earlier. I would NOT put these in the dishwasher. Great and fun product. My husband feels like Wolverine when he uses these. But protect the wood handles. They are NOT dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to clean. Very sturdy. My husband and son-in-law try to smoke anything and everything! They both said that these were great
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: A must have item for a grill master!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing these. First set was for my husband. This pair was a gift for my brother-in-law. Love these! Very easy to shred pork tenderloin!
customer_reviews.author: Charmeej

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These things are amazing! They look great and shred perfectly. They are sharp and very useful for holding and moving food as well - use to hold and slice/carve
customer_reviews.author: Russ Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these is great! My husband loved these meat claws. The handle quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Meliss

customer_reviews.title: If your man likes to bbq get this
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriends loves these!! Best gift I bought him this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Dianeomite

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: Really great tool, incredibly sturdy and surprised at how heavy and durable they were. Work great
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Meat shredding claws
customer_reviews.text: Meat has no chance of avoiding being shredded! Prepare to become a pulled pork slider!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Yoho

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We use these claws all the time. Shreds chicken, pork, beef so nicely. Especially when the meat it too hot to touch. It’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: K.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Absolute rippers
customer_reviews.text: They are sharp and exactly what I was hoping for. They are amazing at shredding and cutting meat. Learn to use the sharps together and they will destroy bark and all. Will never go back to plastic ones again. Choose what you shred your meat on carefully these claws will leave their marks on any cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy duty. I bought them for my dad to help him lift the turkey out of the pan st Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Re:size
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and durable but much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.author: jonesing

customer_reviews.title: BBQ essential
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for son-in-law. Said they were very durable. He hadn't seen any like these before. He was excited to receive them.
customer_reviews.author: The Warden

customer_reviews.title: Makes pulling chicken and pork much easier!
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my mother. She was ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Graham

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband. first time he used them was on a boston butt. these are very sharp and made quick work of the situation. very easy to handle, he loves them
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER Angles

customer_reviews.title: BBQ
customer_reviews.text: If you like to smoke pork butts, this a really nice sturdy claw to pull the pork
customer_reviews.author: Naples

customer_reviews.title: Best meat shredders!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best bear claws I've ever purchased. From shredding to holding meat for carving, they do the job well.
customer_reviews.author: G Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected
customer_reviews.text: I have used the the "stamped out" claws in the past. Most are cheap c#$% that bend after a time or two. I am impressed with these.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Much nicer than those plastic ones
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feel solid and it will last for a long time. There is a sharp half inch cutting edge at the tip of each digit, btw. The stainless is not the polished type, it has a rough texture on it.
customer_reviews.author: bn

customer_reviews.title: Shreds good.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool bear claws. Good quality. Perfect for whatever you shred.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya P.

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift! Very sharp so I can seem them working very well!
customer_reviews.author: akl2528

customer_reviews.title: A fun tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun tool to use. Can using a couple of forks work? Yes. Can you pretend to be wolverine? No.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Buhrman

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on meat claws for my husband. He BBQ's often and I wanted to make sure he got the best ones for Christmas. The quality of these is 10/10! They are heavy duty, but lightweight. The blades came super sharp. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: I use this multiple times through my day. I work at a casino BBQ restaurant and this works so well on my smoked pork shoulder
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy without having too much weight. These were much easier to use than two forks and they’re better for my hands to grasp. Made quick work of two pork roasts.
customer_reviews.author: H. James

customer_reviews.title: These work great! Love them
customer_reviews.text: These work great! Love them. I work for a caterer who does a lot of pulled pork, they made short time of shredding the meat. I did use some olive oil on the wood handles to seal them before I used them.
customer_reviews.author: crutchman

customer_reviews.title: Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift! Will not be used by recipients for several months
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Will order more
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift, prompt shipping and I have extra large hands and I can get my hands in easly. They feel heavy duty and I don't see any spots that would be difficult to clean. Can't wait to put another order in for me a set.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My son has big hands and they were easy for him to hold and pull meat a part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: these item is solid, it little big for my hand,very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Duc nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy easy to use easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Just rinse and throw in the dishwasher. Works great on chicken once the chicken is somewhat soft.
customer_reviews.author: jason murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Dad
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel claws were a great gift for a family member. Especially for someone who loves to cook and does not have full use of one side of their body. Packaging was neat and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Tameeka

customer_reviews.title: The Wolverine lite!
customer_reviews.text: These things were awesome!!! I felt like the Wolverine and made mince meat out of that pork shoulder. Are they a tad expensive... yes, but worth every penny much better than the cheap plastic things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Metal claws to shred meat, that's the only headline..
customer_reviews.text: Great for handling larger cuts of meat, be a bear! Shred pork or beef easily and be the BBQ hero at your next backyard gathering
customer_reviews.author: Cali Life

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made claws!
customer_reviews.text: These are well made heavy duty claws. They are heavy so they help easily claw through pork shoulder. The quality actually far exceeded my expectation, which is rare these days. The packaging was very good and the product arrived within 36 hours from the time I placed the order. I'm not sure how they are able to deliver so fast.
customer_reviews.author: JD71

customer_reviews.title: Eh, it’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Just hard to use? Rather clunky. Cool looking hanging in our kitchen, but he’s to use
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Furey

customer_reviews.title: Built like tanks, can't image them ever wearing out
customer_reviews.text: These things are beasts. Built like tanks, can't image them ever wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Mark  Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love LOVE that these are actually metal and wood. Much sturdier than the plastic ones I usually see. Bought them as part of a Father's Day present for my dad and I think it was his favorite part of the gift.
customer_reviews.author: maryellen

customer_reviews.title: Pulled pork ease
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for his birthday and he loves them! We've used them many times to pull pork apart that was cooked in the smoker.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely boxed. I will be pleased to include these among my holiday gifts for my brother in law.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredder
customer_reviews.text: Great for shredding...we use them when we smoke meat for bbqs

customer_reviews.text: I used it on a pork shoulder and it made the pulled pork a breeze to make.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, depicted in photo
customer_reviews.text: As described. Seem to high quality. A little smaller than expected, but that was my imagination running wild. They’re NOT Wolverine size claws, but will shred through some BBQ pork, likity split
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Seems well built but will be curious how the wood handles will last after multiple washings and dryings.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shredding
customer_reviews.text: I like how sharp the claws are. Really makes shredding and grabbing convenient. Could be a little sturdier between the Wood and the Metal.

customer_reviews.title: Love these claws
customer_reviews.text: I use these for pulled pork they make it so easy. Be careful if you are using a foil pan it will shred the pan with the meat.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas. He loves making pulled pork so I thought these would be helpful! They are great! Would buy them again!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband, they work great. Good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better then the plastic claws I used to have or the metal wire ones

customer_reviews.title: We love these things
customer_reviews.text: We love these things. We got a Boston Butt at the meat market put it on the smoker for about 10 Hrs. To it out to make BBQ sandwiches and with these claws it was a snap shredded up and ready to eat in no time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Stout

customer_reviews.title: Careful with dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, only issue is washing. Make sure you don’t throw them in the dish washer or the stain on the handle will come off.

customer_reviews.title: Great for All Meats
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad and he uses them all the time, I liked how these are dishwasher safe and it doesn’t have a crease for food to buildup in the back.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for shredding Boston Butts and Chicken. Makes the job much easier. Handles are easy grip!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for BBQ Enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: Rips...So long using serving fork! These are the only ones I found that are SS metal, so if you're looking for quality look no further! Be sure to hand wash and oil the wood every so often.

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used these yet. Very sharp and solid. Don;t leave where kids can find them.

customer_reviews.text: Aesthetic as well as durable! These will be put to a lot of work in our kitchen!

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable Meat claws
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were made of wood and metal rather than plastic. They worked great for pulled pork and I am so glad I bought them!

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Used to pull pork apart. Handles didn't get hot. Easy to clean afterwards.

product_meta.title: Metal Meat Claws, 1Easylife 18/8 Stainless Steel Meat Forks with Wooden Handle, Best Meat Claws for Shredding, Pulling, Handing, Lifting & Serving Pork, Turkey, Chicken, Brisket
feature_bullets: ★PREMIUM HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL BEAR CLAW: Compare with some plastic or Nylon claws which may melted or bent and create food safety issues, our durable claws are made of solid 18/8 304 stainless steel, never melt or bent and take heat resistance 1112°F / 600°C.
★HAND-CRAFTED THICK WOODEN HANDLES: Pulled pork claws with durable wooden handle and not hollowed out in makes them easier to grip and clean (as nothing really stuck to them).

★SHREDDED in NO TIME: Not too far apart wolf claws with SOLID PRISMATIC TINES can shred meat easily in seconds , more efficient than those plastic claws as well as some traditional forks that bend easily and scorched your hands repeatedly.

★AN HIGH QUALITY GIFT to SOME AVID BARBECUES/ SMOKERS: A must have meat shredding claws for everyone who likes to grill, smoke or maybe a big fan of Wolverine, these pork claws are better plus, you can act like Wolverine.
